thread.title: U.S., Russia to Hold Third Round of Talks to Avoid Syria Campaign Conflicts
thread.title_full: U.S., Russia to Hold Third Round of Talks to Avoid Syria Campaign Conflicts - WSJ

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: U.S., Russia to Hold Third Round of Talks to Avoid Syria Campaign Conflicts
text:
U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter on Tuesday said the U.S. and Russia will hold a third round of talks aimed at avoiding conflicts between their military air campaigns in Syria.
U.S. officials say Russia’s airstrikes have largely targeted Syrian opposition groups other than Islamic State in a bid to shore up Syrian President Bashar al-Assad’s government. The U.S. defense chief called on Russia to change its “failing strategy,” and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
